name: eslint-plugin-folders-rules
description: Eslint rule for consistent folder names.

scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin master

author: Avi Haiat <thaiat@yoobic.com>
